definitions: the position or office of presiding over a meeting.
shortDefinitions: position or office of presiding over meeting

definitions: permanent or long-term presidency over a committee, company, or other organization

examples.text: she was elected to the chairmanship of the company

shortDefinitions: permanent or long-term presidency over organization

definitions: (since 1949) the office of the leading figure in the Chinese Communist Party.
shortDefinitions: office of leading figure in Chinese Communist Party

definitions: the action of presiding over a meeting

examples.text: a meeting held under the chairmanship of the Vice-Chancellor

shortDefinitions: action of presiding over a meeting
